PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2002-11242002-06-210,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
PrecisRe-appointment of ANDRÉE NOËL of Montréal, Quebec, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; designation of ANDRÉE NOËL for the Quebec region, as established under subsection 10(1,1) of that Act; and determine that ANDRÉE NOËL shall reside within 100 kilometres of the Quebec regional office; effective November 1, 2002.
Attachments
